OOC - Entering Wheelie into this thread, will say he's mostly sitting in t=
he background.  I won't be able to post as fast to keep up with this amazin=
gly fun but moving very fast thread, so will mostly have him at the periphe=
ry of events so as to not make people wait for me.

Watching the medbay, as=
 the casualties, or the rescuees were come in, Wheelie stayed at the back, =
memories flickering through his carnial processor.  The small Autobot, stan=
ding in the back and watching the Beast Warriors hang about the medbay.

Ta=
king steps back, watching from the periphery as the new Dragon-winged Tusco=
n went around.  

Speaking up quietly, "All I know, wherever I've gone, is =
never trust a Decepticon.  Deception is in tehir name, their way of life, t=
heir claim to fame.  We can't let them do whatever they're about.  I wouldn=
't trust them to keep thier end of things , for no matter whta they do, dar=
kness they will always bring.  But we have to figure ou twhat they're afte,=
r to send them all to the hereafter."
